mapper.select: SELECT A.ATTENDANCE_REQUEST_ID , A.REQUEST_REASON , A.START_DATE , A.END_DATE , A.CREATED_AT , A.REJECTION_REASON , A.REQUEST_STATUS , A.CANCELED_AT , A.CANCEL_REASON , A.CANCEL_STATUS , A.DESTINATION , A.EMPLOYEE_ID , B.NAME , A.ATTENDANCE_REQUEST_TYPE_ID , C.ATTENDANCE_REQUEST_TYPE_NAME , D.ATTENDANCE_REQUEST_FILE_ID , D.FILE_NAME , D.FILE_URL FROM ATTENDANCE_REQUEST A JOIN EMPLOYEE B ON A.EMPLOYEE_ID = B.EMPLOYEE_ID JOIN ATTENDANCE_REQUEST_TYPE C ON A.ATTENDANCE_REQUEST_TYPE_ID = C.ATTENDANCE_REQUEST_TYPE_ID LEFT JOIN ATTENDANCE_REQUEST_FILE D ON A.ATTENDANCE_REQUEST_ID = D.ATTENDANCE_REQUEST_ID WHERE A.EMPLOYEE_ID = #{ employeeId } AND A.ATTENDANCE_REQUEST_TYPE_ID = 2 ORDER BY A.ATTENDANCE_REQUEST_ID DESC LIMIT 5

SELECT A.ATTENDANCE_REQUEST_ID , A.REQUEST_REASON , A.START_DATE , A.END_DATE , A.CREATED_AT , A.REJECTION_REASON , A.REQUEST_STATUS , A.CANCELED_AT , A.CANCEL_REASON , A.CANCEL_STATUS , A.DESTINATION , A.EMPLOYEE_ID , B.NAME , A.ATTENDANCE_REQUEST_TYPE_ID , C.ATTENDANCE_REQUEST_TYPE_NAME , D.ATTENDANCE_REQUEST_FILE_ID , D.FILE_NAME , D.FILE_URL FROM ATTENDANCE_REQUEST A JOIN EMPLOYEE B ON A.EMPLOYEE_ID = B.EMPLOYEE_ID JOIN ATTENDANCE_REQUEST_TYPE C ON A.ATTENDANCE_REQUEST_TYPE_ID = C.ATTENDANCE_REQUEST_TYPE_ID LEFT JOIN ATTENDANCE_REQUEST_FILE D ON A.ATTENDANCE_REQUEST_ID = D.ATTENDANCE_REQUEST_ID WHERE A.EMPLOYEE_ID = #{ employeeId } AND A.ATTENDANCE_REQUEST_TYPE_ID = 1 ORDER BY A.ATTENDANCE_REQUEST_ID DESC LIMIT 5

SELECT A.ATTENDANCE_REQUEST_ID , A.REQUEST_REASON , A.START_DATE , A.END_DATE , A.CREATED_AT , A.REJECTION_REASON , A.REQUEST_STATUS , A.CANCELED_AT , A.CANCEL_REASON , A.CANCEL_STATUS , A.DESTINATION , A.EMPLOYEE_ID , B.NAME , A.ATTENDANCE_REQUEST_TYPE_ID , C.ATTENDANCE_REQUEST_TYPE_NAME , D.ATTENDANCE_REQUEST_FILE_ID , D.FILE_NAME , D.FILE_URL FROM ATTENDANCE_REQUEST A JOIN EMPLOYEE B ON A.EMPLOYEE_ID = B.EMPLOYEE_ID JOIN ATTENDANCE_REQUEST_TYPE C ON A.ATTENDANCE_REQUEST_TYPE_ID = C.ATTENDANCE_REQUEST_TYPE_ID LEFT JOIN ATTENDANCE_REQUEST_FILE D ON A.ATTENDANCE_REQUEST_ID = D.ATTENDANCE_REQUEST_ID WHERE A.EMPLOYEE_ID = #{ employeeId } AND A.ATTENDANCE_REQUEST_TYPE_ID = 3 ORDER BY A.ATTENDANCE_REQUEST_ID DESC LIMIT 5

SELECT A.ATTENDANCE_REQUEST_ID , A.REQUEST_REASON , A.START_DATE , A.END_DATE , A.CREATED_AT , A.REJECTION_REASON , A.REQUEST_STATUS , A.CANCELED_AT , A.CANCEL_REASON , A.CANCEL_STATUS , A.DESTINATION , A.EMPLOYEE_ID , B.NAME , A.ATTENDANCE_REQUEST_TYPE_ID , C.ATTENDANCE_REQUEST_TYPE_NAME , D.ATTENDANCE_REQUEST_FILE_ID , D.FILE_NAME , D.FILE_URL FROM ATTENDANCE_REQUEST A JOIN EMPLOYEE B ON A.EMPLOYEE_ID = B.EMPLOYEE_ID JOIN ATTENDANCE_REQUEST_TYPE C ON A.ATTENDANCE_REQUEST_TYPE_ID = C.ATTENDANCE_REQUEST_TYPE_ID LEFT JOIN ATTENDANCE_REQUEST_FILE D ON A.ATTENDANCE_REQUEST_ID = D.ATTENDANCE_REQUEST_ID WHERE A.EMPLOYEE_ID = #{ employeeId } AND A.ATTENDANCE_REQUEST_TYPE_ID = 4 ORDER BY A.ATTENDANCE_REQUEST_ID DESC LIMIT 5

SELECT A.ATTENDANCE_REQUEST_ID , A.REQUEST_REASON , A.START_DATE , A.END_DATE , A.CREATED_AT , A.REJECTION_REASON , A.REQUEST_STATUS , A.CANCELED_AT , A.CANCEL_REASON , A.CANCEL_STATUS , A.DESTINATION , A.EMPLOYEE_ID , B.NAME , A.ATTENDANCE_REQUEST_TYPE_ID , C.ATTENDANCE_REQUEST_TYPE_NAME , D.ATTENDANCE_REQUEST_FILE_ID , D.FILE_NAME , D.FILE_URL FROM ATTENDANCE_REQUEST A JOIN EMPLOYEE B ON A.EMPLOYEE_ID = B.EMPLOYEE_ID JOIN ATTENDANCE_REQUEST_TYPE C ON A.ATTENDANCE_REQUEST_TYPE_ID = C.ATTENDANCE_REQUEST_TYPE_ID LEFT JOIN ATTENDANCE_REQUEST_FILE D ON A.ATTENDANCE_REQUEST_ID = D.ATTENDANCE_REQUEST_ID WHERE A.EMPLOYEE_ID = #{ employeeId } AND A.ATTENDANCE_REQUEST_TYPE_ID = 5 ORDER BY A.ATTENDANCE_REQUEST_ID DESC LIMIT 5

SELECT A.ATTENDANCE_REQUEST_ID , A.REQUEST_REASON , A.START_DATE , A.END_DATE , A.CREATED_AT , A.REJECTION_REASON , A.REQUEST_STATUS , A.CANCELED_AT , A.CANCEL_REASON , A.CANCEL_STATUS , A.DESTINATION , A.EMPLOYEE_ID , B.NAME , A.ATTENDANCE_REQUEST_TYPE_ID , C.ATTENDANCE_REQUEST_TYPE_NAME , D.ATTENDANCE_REQUEST_FILE_ID , D.FILE_NAME , D.FILE_URL FROM ATTENDANCE_REQUEST A JOIN EMPLOYEE B ON A.EMPLOYEE_ID = B.EMPLOYEE_ID JOIN ATTENDANCE_REQUEST_TYPE C ON A.ATTENDANCE_REQUEST_TYPE_ID = C.ATTENDANCE_REQUEST_TYPE_ID LEFT JOIN ATTENDANCE_REQUEST_FILE D ON A.ATTENDANCE_REQUEST_ID = D.ATTENDANCE_REQUEST_ID WHERE A.EMPLOYEE_ID = #{ employeeId } AND A.ATTENDANCE_REQUEST_TYPE_ID = 6 ORDER BY A.ATTENDANCE_REQUEST_ID DESC LIMIT 5

SELECT A.ATTENDANCE_REQUEST_ID , A.REQUEST_REASON , A.START_DATE , A.END_DATE , A.CREATED_AT , A.REJECTION_REASON , A.REQUEST_STATUS , A.CANCELED_AT , A.CANCEL_REASON , A.CANCEL_STATUS , A.DESTINATION , A.EMPLOYEE_ID , B.NAME , A.ATTENDANCE_REQUEST_TYPE_ID , C.ATTENDANCE_REQUEST_TYPE_NAME , D.ATTENDANCE_REQUEST_FILE_ID , D.FILE_NAME , D.FILE_URL FROM ATTENDANCE_REQUEST A JOIN EMPLOYEE B ON A.EMPLOYEE_ID = B.EMPLOYEE_ID JOIN ATTENDANCE_REQUEST_TYPE C ON A.ATTENDANCE_REQUEST_TYPE_ID = C.ATTENDANCE_REQUEST_TYPE_ID LEFT JOIN ATTENDANCE_REQUEST_FILE D ON A.ATTENDANCE_REQUEST_ID = D.ATTENDANCE_REQUEST_ID WHERE A.EMPLOYEE_ID = #{ employeeId } AND A.ATTENDANCE_REQUEST_TYPE_ID = 2 AND YEAR(A.CREATED_AT) = YEAR(#{ date }) AND MONTH(A.CREATED_AT) = MONTH(#{ date }) ORDER BY A.ATTENDANCE_REQUEST_ID DESC LIMIT #{ elementsPerPage } OFFSET #{ offset }

SELECT A.ATTENDANCE_REQUEST_ID , A.REQUEST_REASON , A.START_DATE , A.END_DATE , A.CREATED_AT , A.REJECTION_REASON , A.REQUEST_STATUS , A.CANCELED_AT , A.CANCEL_REASON , A.CANCEL_STATUS , A.DESTINATION , A.EMPLOYEE_ID , B.NAME , A.ATTENDANCE_REQUEST_TYPE_ID , C.ATTENDANCE_REQUEST_TYPE_NAME , D.ATTENDANCE_REQUEST_FILE_ID , D.FILE_NAME , D.FILE_URL FROM ATTENDANCE_REQUEST A JOIN EMPLOYEE B ON A.EMPLOYEE_ID = B.EMPLOYEE_ID JOIN ATTENDANCE_REQUEST_TYPE C ON A.ATTENDANCE_REQUEST_TYPE_ID = C.ATTENDANCE_REQUEST_TYPE_ID LEFT JOIN ATTENDANCE_REQUEST_FILE D ON A.ATTENDANCE_REQUEST_ID = D.ATTENDANCE_REQUEST_ID WHERE A.EMPLOYEE_ID = #{ employeeId } AND A.ATTENDANCE_REQUEST_TYPE_ID = 1 AND YEAR(A.CREATED_AT) = YEAR(#{ date }) AND MONTH(A.CREATED_AT) = MONTH(#{ date }) ORDER BY A.ATTENDANCE_REQUEST_ID DESC LIMIT #{ elementsPerPage } OFFSET #{ offset }

SELECT A.ATTENDANCE_REQUEST_ID , A.REQUEST_REASON , A.START_DATE , A.END_DATE , A.CREATED_AT , A.REJECTION_REASON , A.REQUEST_STATUS , A.CANCELED_AT , A.CANCEL_REASON , A.CANCEL_STATUS , A.DESTINATION , A.EMPLOYEE_ID , B.NAME , A.ATTENDANCE_REQUEST_TYPE_ID , C.ATTENDANCE_REQUEST_TYPE_NAME , D.ATTENDANCE_REQUEST_FILE_ID , D.FILE_NAME , D.FILE_URL FROM ATTENDANCE_REQUEST A JOIN EMPLOYEE B ON A.EMPLOYEE_ID = B.EMPLOYEE_ID JOIN ATTENDANCE_REQUEST_TYPE C ON A.ATTENDANCE_REQUEST_TYPE_ID = C.ATTENDANCE_REQUEST_TYPE_ID LEFT JOIN ATTENDANCE_REQUEST_FILE D ON A.ATTENDANCE_REQUEST_ID = D.ATTENDANCE_REQUEST_ID WHERE A.EMPLOYEE_ID = #{ employeeId } AND A.ATTENDANCE_REQUEST_TYPE_ID = 3 AND YEAR(A.CREATED_AT) = YEAR(#{ date }) AND MONTH(A.CREATED_AT) = MONTH(#{ date }) ORDER BY A.ATTENDANCE_REQUEST_ID DESC LIMIT #{ elementsPerPage } OFFSET #{ offset }

SELECT A.ATTENDANCE_REQUEST_ID , A.REQUEST_REASON , A.START_DATE , A.END_DATE , A.CREATED_AT , A.REJECTION_REASON , A.REQUEST_STATUS , A.CANCELED_AT , A.CANCEL_REASON , A.CANCEL_STATUS , A.DESTINATION , A.EMPLOYEE_ID , B.NAME , A.ATTENDANCE_REQUEST_TYPE_ID , C.ATTENDANCE_REQUEST_TYPE_NAME , D.ATTENDANCE_REQUEST_FILE_ID , D.FILE_NAME , D.FILE_URL FROM ATTENDANCE_REQUEST A JOIN EMPLOYEE B ON A.EMPLOYEE_ID = B.EMPLOYEE_ID JOIN ATTENDANCE_REQUEST_TYPE C ON A.ATTENDANCE_REQUEST_TYPE_ID = C.ATTENDANCE_REQUEST_TYPE_ID LEFT JOIN ATTENDANCE_REQUEST_FILE D ON A.ATTENDANCE_REQUEST_ID = D.ATTENDANCE_REQUEST_ID WHERE A.EMPLOYEE_ID = #{ employeeId } AND A.ATTENDANCE_REQUEST_TYPE_ID = 4 AND YEAR(A.CREATED_AT) = YEAR(#{ date }) AND MONTH(A.CREATED_AT) = MONTH(#{ date }) ORDER BY A.ATTENDANCE_REQUEST_ID DESC LIMIT #{ elementsPerPage } OFFSET #{ offset }

SELECT A.ATTENDANCE_REQUEST_ID , A.REQUEST_REASON , A.START_DATE , A.END_DATE , A.CREATED_AT , A.REJECTION_REASON , A.REQUEST_STATUS , A.CANCELED_AT , A.CANCEL_REASON , A.CANCEL_STATUS , A.DESTINATION , A.EMPLOYEE_ID , B.NAME , A.ATTENDANCE_REQUEST_TYPE_ID , C.ATTENDANCE_REQUEST_TYPE_NAME , D.ATTENDANCE_REQUEST_FILE_ID , D.FILE_NAME , D.FILE_URL FROM ATTENDANCE_REQUEST A JOIN EMPLOYEE B ON A.EMPLOYEE_ID = B.EMPLOYEE_ID JOIN ATTENDANCE_REQUEST_TYPE C ON A.ATTENDANCE_REQUEST_TYPE_ID = C.ATTENDANCE_REQUEST_TYPE_ID LEFT JOIN ATTENDANCE_REQUEST_FILE D ON A.ATTENDANCE_REQUEST_ID = D.ATTENDANCE_REQUEST_ID WHERE A.EMPLOYEE_ID = #{ employeeId } AND A.ATTENDANCE_REQUEST_TYPE_ID = 5 AND YEAR(A.CREATED_AT) = YEAR(#{ date }) AND MONTH(A.CREATED_AT) = MONTH(#{ date }) ORDER BY A.ATTENDANCE_REQUEST_ID DESC LIMIT #{ elementsPerPage } OFFSET #{ offset }

SELECT A.ATTENDANCE_REQUEST_ID , A.REQUEST_REASON , A.START_DATE , A.END_DATE , A.CREATED_AT , A.REJECTION_REASON , A.REQUEST_STATUS , A.CANCELED_AT , A.CANCEL_REASON , A.CANCEL_STATUS , A.DESTINATION , A.EMPLOYEE_ID , B.NAME , A.ATTENDANCE_REQUEST_TYPE_ID , C.ATTENDANCE_REQUEST_TYPE_NAME , D.ATTENDANCE_REQUEST_FILE_ID , D.FILE_NAME , D.FILE_URL FROM ATTENDANCE_REQUEST A JOIN EMPLOYEE B ON A.EMPLOYEE_ID = B.EMPLOYEE_ID JOIN ATTENDANCE_REQUEST_TYPE C ON A.ATTENDANCE_REQUEST_TYPE_ID = C.ATTENDANCE_REQUEST_TYPE_ID LEFT JOIN ATTENDANCE_REQUEST_FILE D ON A.ATTENDANCE_REQUEST_ID = D.ATTENDANCE_REQUEST_ID WHERE A.EMPLOYEE_ID = #{ employeeId } AND A.ATTENDANCE_REQUEST_TYPE_ID = 6 AND YEAR(A.CREATED_AT) = YEAR(#{ date }) AND MONTH(A.CREATED_AT) = MONTH(#{ date }) ORDER BY A.ATTENDANCE_REQUEST_ID DESC LIMIT #{ elementsPerPage } OFFSET #{ offset }

SELECT COUNT(*) AS TOTAL FROM ATTENDANCE_REQUEST A WHERE A.EMPLOYEE_ID = #{ employeeId } AND A.ATTENDANCE_REQUEST_TYPE_ID = 2 AND YEAR(A.CREATED_AT) = YEAR(#{ date }) AND MONTH(A.CREATED_AT) = MONTH(#{ date })

SELECT COUNT(*) AS TOTAL FROM ATTENDANCE_REQUEST A WHERE A.EMPLOYEE_ID = #{ employeeId } AND A.ATTENDANCE_REQUEST_TYPE_ID = 1 AND YEAR(A.CREATED_AT) = YEAR(#{ date }) AND MONTH(A.CREATED_AT) = MONTH(#{ date })

SELECT COUNT(*) AS TOTAL FROM ATTENDANCE_REQUEST A WHERE A.EMPLOYEE_ID = #{ employeeId } AND A.ATTENDANCE_REQUEST_TYPE_ID = 3 AND YEAR(A.CREATED_AT) = YEAR(#{ date }) AND MONTH(A.CREATED_AT) = MONTH(#{ date })

SELECT COUNT(*) AS TOTAL FROM ATTENDANCE_REQUEST A WHERE A.EMPLOYEE_ID = #{ employeeId } AND A.ATTENDANCE_REQUEST_TYPE_ID = 4 AND YEAR(A.CREATED_AT) = YEAR(#{ date }) AND MONTH(A.CREATED_AT) = MONTH(#{ date })

SELECT COUNT(*) AS TOTAL FROM ATTENDANCE_REQUEST A WHERE A.EMPLOYEE_ID = #{ employeeId } AND A.ATTENDANCE_REQUEST_TYPE_ID = 5 AND YEAR(A.CREATED_AT) = YEAR(#{ date }) AND MONTH(A.CREATED_AT) = MONTH(#{ date })

SELECT COUNT(*) AS TOTAL FROM ATTENDANCE_REQUEST A WHERE A.EMPLOYEE_ID = #{ employeeId } AND A.ATTENDANCE_REQUEST_TYPE_ID = 6 AND YEAR(A.CREATED_AT) = YEAR(#{ date }) AND MONTH(A.CREATED_AT) = MONTH(#{ date })
